attributes.action: The Right For Re Patriated Soilders to Pass Through Carterton
attributes.additional_details: A decision has been taken by the Government to send our brave servicemen and women who have given their lives for this Country through back roads by-passing the small town of Carterton so no-one can line a root to pay respects as was the case in Royal Wootton Bassett. This is wrong and this decision must be changed.
